alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, northwestern Rutherford, eastern Williamson and southwestern Wilson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smyrna, or 11 miles northwest of Murfreesboro, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Nolensville, Oak Hill, Antioch and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 78 and 79. Interstate 24 between mile markers 55 and 75. Interstate 840 between mile markers 36 and 54, and between mile markers 57 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
